Hi! My name is Jeff...

I am a computer science professional who is passionate about designing and developing with AI systems. But that's not all - I also happen to be a self-taught artist with over a decade of experience in drawing. While my technical skills are focused on creating solutions with cutting-edge teechnology, my artistic side allows me to connect with people on a more personal level. I enjoy using my artistic talent to brighten people's days by creating custom drawings of them or their loved ones. So, whether it's designing intelligent systems or bringing a smile to someone's face through my art, I love using my skills to make a positive impact on the world.
